bibl.title: A Hexameter Fragment in the Beinecke Library.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 4688. Provenance unknown, 3rd or 4th century. The fragment mentions a song or singer, and possibly a mother lamenting her son. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Mark de Kreij, A Hexameter Fragment in the Beinecke Library.
